description:
My Cozy 1 Bedroom (queen-sized bed) in the heart of cultural hot-spot Harlem is the perfect spot for touring around Manhattan or visiting friends in Upper Manhattan! Very centrally located and easy access to nearly anywhere in Manhattan.

Yankee Stadium, Columbia University, Randall's Island Park, and City College of New York are just a hop, skip, and a jump away! You won't find a better place to stay, so why keep looking? Come stay at my home! You'll be glad you did :)

• 1 Bedroom (queen-sized bed) 
• Sofa bed
• I also have a travel crib (Pack n' Play) that is available for use if you are traveling with a baby or toddler.

Guests will have access to all parts of my home except for those areas that common sense would dictate are off-limits like storage areas and underneath furniture.

I use a concierge service that will be available to answer any questions or concerns 24/7! Please keep all communication on Airbnb. Phone calls and emails will not be answered.

From its inception, Harlem has kept a cadence like no other. Best known for its role in creating the 1920s cultural movement, the Harlem Renaissance, the neighborhood still celebrates its African American roots and vibrant culture. From the galleries of its iconic theatres to the dusky insides of its monumental jazz clubs, Harlem’s influential rhythm permeates the perservering neighborhood. Having reinvented itself many times over, its inimitable beat continues to attract attention.

A, C, B, D Trains within a 5-10 minute walk.
Citi Bike
1 Block from St. Nicolas Park
name: Cozy 1 Bed in the Heart of Upper Manhattan
review: Convenient to public transit, major grocery store.  Big firm bed.  Plentiful and immediate hot water.
